scripts.dev:api: cd api && PORT=${DEV_API_PORT:-8080} npm run dev
scripts.dev:web: cd web && PORT=${DEV_WEB_PORT:-3000} npm run dev
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run supabase:start" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.gen:api: curl -X GET http://localhost:8080/api/v1/doc | tee ./web/openapi.json && cd web && npm run orval
scripts.pulumi:dev: cd pulumi && pulumi stack select dev && pulumi up
scripts.pulumi:prod: cd pulumi && pulumi stack select prod && pulumi up
scripts.pulumi:preview:dev: cd pulumi && pulumi stack select dev && pulumi preview
scripts.pulumi:preview:prod: cd pulumi && pulumi stack select prod && pulumi preview
scripts.pulumi:destroy:dev: cd pulumi && pulumi stack select dev && pulumi destroy
scripts.pulumi:destroy:prod: cd pulumi && pulumi stack select prod && pulumi destroy
